short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Analyze and scrape Facebook posts and comments based on user-defined keywords.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Facebook Posts and Comments Analyzer is an innovative Chrome extension designed to help users efficiently collect and analyze Facebook posts and comments. This powerful tool scrapes content directly into an Excel file, enabling a detailed examination of social interactions at your fingertips.

Key Features:

Data Extraction: Effortlessly scrape posts and comments from Facebook pages and profiles.
Excel Integration: Automatically format and save the scraped data into an Excel spreadsheet for easy access and manipulation.
Custom Keyword Summary: Customize and highlight keywords to generate a summary page, focusing on your specific areas of interest.
Insightful Analysis: Gain valuable insights with the summarized data page, presenting the key information in a digestible format.

Benefits:

Save time by automating data collection and summarization.
Improve your understanding of trends and public opinion on Facebook.

Whether you are a marketer, researcher, or just curious about social trends, Facebook Posts and Comments Analyzer is the perfect tool to enhance your social media strategy.
